verses.verse: Now <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> was a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot:<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah.<s%>

And <S%H1568>Gilead's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up, and they <S%H1644>thrust<s%> out <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, You shall not <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in our <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> for you are the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H312>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob:<s%> and there were <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out with him.
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in process of <S%H3117>time,<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it was so, that <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob:<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and be our <S%H7101>captain,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> Did not you <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and <S%H1644>expel<s%> me out of my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%> and <S%H4069>why<s%> are you <S%H935>come<s%> to me <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you are in <S%H6887>distress?<s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> Therefore we <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to you <S%H6258>now,<s%> that you may <S%H1980>go<s%> with us, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and be our <S%H7218>head<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H7725>home<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> me, shall I be your <S%H7218>head?<s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H8085>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H3651>so<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7101>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them: and <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1696>uttered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you to do with me, that you are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> me to <S%H3898>fight<s%> in my <S%H776>land?<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> away my <S%H776>land,<s%> when they <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even to <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> and to <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H7725>restore<s%> those lands <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably.<s%>
And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5750><s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon:<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> not away the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> nor the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon:<s%>

But when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3212>walked<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%>

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H5674>pass<s%> through your <S%H776>land:<s%> but the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> would not <S%H8085>listen<s%> thereto. And in <S%H1571>like<s%> manner they <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H14>consent:<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>

Then they <S%H3212>went<s%> along through the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8121><s%> side of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> but <S%H935>came<s%> not within the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> for <S%H769>Arnon<s%> was the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Let us <S%H5674>pass,<s%> we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, through your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> my <S%H4725>place.<s%>

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H539>trusted<s%> not <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>coast:<s%> but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> together, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3096>Jahaz,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them: so <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H776>country.<s%>

And they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even to <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> even to <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

So <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and should you <S%H3423>possess<s%> it?

Will not you <S%H3423>possess<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> your <S%H430>god<s%> gives you to <S%H3423>possess?<s%> So <S%H3605>whomsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3423>drive<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> us, them will we <S%H3423>possess.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> are you any thing <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab?<s%> did he ever <S%H7378>strive<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or did he ever <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> them,

While <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that be along by the <S%H3027>coasts<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> therefore did you not <S%H5337>recover<s%> them within that <S%H6256>time?<s%>

Why I have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you, but you <S%H6213>do<s%> me <S%H7451>wrong<s%> to <S%H3898>war<s%> against me: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H8199>Judge<s%> be <S%H8199>judge<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

However, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him.

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> on <S%H3316>Jephthah,<s%> and he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and from <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> he <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you shall without fail <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> into my <S%H3027>hands,<s%>

Then it shall be, that <S%H834>whatever<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me, when I <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> shall surely be the <S%H3068>LORD's,<s%> and I will <S%H5927>offer<s%> it up for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> them from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> even <S%H5704>till<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> even <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and to the <S%H58>plain<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%> Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him with <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances:<s%> and she was his <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H3173>child;<s%> beside her he had <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Alas,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter!<s%> you have <S%H3766>brought<s%> me very <S%H3766>low,<s%> and you are one of them that <S%H5916>trouble<s%> me: for I have <S%H6475>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, My <S%H1>father,<s%> if you have <S%H6475>opened<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me according to that <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for as <S%H310>much<s%> <S%H834><s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>taken<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for you of your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> Let <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%> for me: let me <S%H7503>alone<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> up and <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1058>mourn<s%> my <S%H1331>virginity,<s%> I and my <S%H7464>fellows.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go.<s%> And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> her away for <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and she <S%H3212>went<s%> with her <S%H7464>companions,<s%> and <S%H1058>bewailed<s%> her <S%H1331>virginity<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> that she <S%H7725>returned<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> who <S%H6213>did<s%> with her according to his <S%H5088>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H5087>vowed:<s%> and she <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> And it was a <S%H2706>custom<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

That the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3117>yearly<s%> to <S%H8567>lament<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in a <S%H8141>year.<s%>
